MemberSignature.Value: public void Clone (out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIStream ppstm);

abstract member Clone : -> unit

param.name: ppstm
param.span: 成功返回时包含新的流对象。

span.span: On successful return, contains the new stream object.

summary.span: 创建一个新的流对象，该流对象具有自己的查找指针且该指针与原始流引用相同的字节。

span.span: Creates a new stream object with its own seek pointer that references the same bytes as the original stream.

public: void Commit(int grfCommitFlags);
abstract member Commit : int -> unit

param.name: grfCommitFlags
param.span: 控制提交对流对象的更改的方式。

span.span: Controls how the changes for the stream object are committed.

summary.span: 确保对以事务模式打开的流对象所做的任何更改都能反映在父级存储中。

span.span: Ensures that any changes made to a stream object open in transacted mode are reflected in the parent storage.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIStream pstm, long cb, IntPtr pcbRead, IntPtr pcbWritten);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIStream pstm, int64 cb, native int pcbRead, native int pcbWritten) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (pstm As UCOMIStream, cb As Long, pcbRead As IntPtr, pcbWritten As IntPtr)
public: void CopyTo(System::Runtime::InteropServices::UCOMIStream ^ pstm, long cb, IntPtr pcbRead, IntPtr pcbWritten);
abstract member CopyTo : System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIStream * int64 * nativeint * nativeint -> unit

param.name: pstm
param.span: 对目标流的引用。

span.span: Reference to the destination stream.

param.name: cb
param.span: 要从源流复制的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes to copy from the source stream.

param.name: pcbRead
param.span: 成功返回时包含从源读取的实际字节数。

span.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes read from the source.

param.name: pcbWritten
param.span: 成功返回时包含写入到目标的实际字节数。

span.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes written to the destination.

summary.span: 将指定数量的字节从该流中的当前查找指针复制到另一个流中的当前查找指针。

span.span: Copies a specified number of bytes from the current seek pointer in the stream to the current seek pointer in another stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IStream::CopyTo`MSDN 库中。For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IStream::CopyTo` in the MSDN library.

span.span: The requested restrictions on accessing the range.

span.span: Restricts access to a specified range of bytes in the stream.

param.name: cb

span.span: The number of bytes to read from the stream object.

param.name: pcbRead
param.span: 指向 变量的指针，该变量接收从流对象中读取的实际字节数。

span.span: Pointer to a variable that receives the actual number of bytes read from the stream object.

summary.span: 将指定的字节数从流对象读入从当前查找指针开始的内存。

span.span: Reads a specified number of bytes from the stream object into memory starting at the current seek pointer.

summary.span: 放弃自从上次 调用以来对事务处理流所做的所有更改。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Seek (long dlibMove, int dwOrigin, IntPtr plibNewPosition);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Seek(int64 dlibMove, int32 dwOrigin, native int plibNewPosition) cil managed
Public Sub Seek (dlibMove As Long, dwOrigin As Integer, plibNewPosition As IntPtr)
public: void Seek(long dlibMove, int dwOrigin, IntPtr plibNewPosition);
abstract member Seek : int64 * int * nativeint -> unit

param.name: dlibMove
param.span: 要添加到 dwOrigin 的置换。

span.span: Displacement to add to dwOrigin.

param.name: dwOrigin
param.span: 指定查找的起始地址。

span.span: Specifies the origin of the seek.

param.span: 该起始地址可以是文件的开头、当前查找指针或文件的结尾。

span.span: The origin can be the beginning of the file, the current seek pointer, or the end of the file.

param.name: plibNewPosition
param.span: 成功返回时包含从流的开头算起的查找指针的偏移量。

span.span: On successful return, contains the offset of the seek pointer from the beginning of the stream.

summary.span: 将查找指针更改到相对于流的开头、流的结尾或当前查找指针的新位置。

span.span: Changes the seek pointer to a new location relative to the beginning of the stream, to the end of the stream, or to the current seek pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IStream::Seek`MSDN 库中。For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IStream::Seek` in the MSDN library.

abstract member Write : byte[] * int * nativeint -> unit

param.name: pv
param.span: 要写入此流的缓冲区。

span.span: Buffer to write this stream to.

param.name: cb
param.span: 要写入此流的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes to write into the stream.

param.name: pcbWritten
param.span: 成功返回时包含写入此流对象的实际的字节数。

span.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes written to the stream object.

span.span: The caller can set this pointer to , in which case this method does not provide the actual number of bytes written.
